proudToBePara.text: Soins Karismä has had these three aspects at heart since its start. We believe in providing high quality , vegan and cruelty free products to our community and more. The lives of our animal friends are as important as those of a human counterpart.

highQualityPara.text: High quality products are a standard at Soins Karismä. We pride ourselves on offering our clients with the best products that are available on the market. They are researched and developed in our founding city, Montreal! Soins Karismä has taken the time and patience to research each and every ingredient that goes into creating products.

veganPara.text: Soins Karismä vegan products will save you from harmful chemicals and cruel cosmetics and lowers the chances of skin problems such as rashes, allergies, eczemas, acne, skin inflammation and other skin diseases. We want all of our clients to have the best experience when using our shampoos, conditioners and more.

crueltyFreePara.text: Vegan beauty products are never tested on animals and therefore are 100 per cent cruelty free. Our mission is to be consciously aware of the effects that brands have on animals and the world. Soins Karismä has promised to never test on animals and always be open about its practices.
